titles.title: Concerning treatment of the Centennial Bridge, Rock Island, Illinois, under title 23, United States Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 9/22/1993--Introduced. Provides that the Federal participation agreement for the Centennial Bridge, Rock Island, Illinois, shall be treated as if such agreement had been entered into before the effective date of title I of the Intermodal Surface Transportation Efficiency Act of 1991 and may be modified accordingly.
